product_name: Black Diamond Uncut White Gold Pure Chalk Block - 56 grams
long_description: Use this block of Black Diamond Uncut White Gold Pure chalk to keep your hands dry when you're working through hard moves. Magnesium carbonate dries your hands quickly to ensure you have a good grip. One 56g block of chalk.
short_description: Use this block of Black Diamond Uncut White Gold Pure chalk to keep your hands dry when you're working through hard moves.
